projects.title: SeaSalt
projects.description: A fancy Classy Sea food resturant website that give you the vibe of the Sea . it has many sections and it gives the ability to order online and to track Your order ! . The menu is great with some css effects and the whole project colors are amazing !.

projects.title: WakeMeUp
projects.description: An Application that I made to fix a lot of issue that public transportation users face , such as falling a sleep which causes missing the stop it also has a built in alarm that can be used to notify the user that he reached his distination using google maps ! . It also include a built in library and music player .

projects.title: TradeR
projects.description: A Crypto Trading application that I'm planning to create , which can be really helpful in Jordan just to make the government change their mind about making it legal . It would help us trade eaiser and safer ,
